info.brief_description: Yes, yes, another! Why should you come to this one, though? Because anything goes!
info.description:
Appears we've breached a thousand views! Yay! Maybe we can get an addition or two too?

Alright, this is going to be a free for all shrinking story. Toilet stuff? Sure. Gay? Why not. However, there be some rules.

First, try to make good additions. A spelling error here or there isn't so bad, but when you talk as if in soviet, no one understanding you. Cannot be fix, must be delete.

Second, make sure the characters act somewhat believably, except in story lines where it's appropriate. Not everyone, their mother, father, grandmother, 3rd cousin twice removed, and math teacher have a size fetish. We're pretty well the exception, unfortunately.

Third, try to not end the story. I mean, if one of the options is obviously going to kill you (i.e. she's about to sit down and you just stand there like a turkey), then sure, but otherwise, let the story grow.

Fourth, and most importantly, be an awesome person.
